comparators - package comparators
The comparators package provides comparison logic for sorting Shape objects by height, base area, or volume.
compare(Shape, Shape) - Method in class comparators.BaseAreaCompare
Compares two Shape objects by calculating their base area.
compare(Shape, Shape) - Method in class comparators.ShapeComparator
Compares two Shape objects using the property specified in compareType.

Compares two Shape objects based on their calculated volume.
compareTo(Shape) - Method in class shapes.Shape
Compares two shapes based on height.
Cone - Class in shapes
The Cone class represents a three-dimensional geometric shape that extends the abstract Shape class.
Cone(double, double) - Constructor for class shapes.Cone
Constructs a Cone object with a given height and radius.
Cylinder - Class in shapes
The Cylinder class models a 3D shape with two parallel circular bases connected by a curved surface.
Cylinder(double, double) - Constructor for class shapes.Cylinder
Constructs a Cylinder object with a specified height and radius.
